channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- Honor V9 play
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- Honor V9 play

item.title: CVE-2017-15351|2024-08-05T19:57:25.496Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- honor%20v9%20play
item.description: The 'Find Phone' function in Huawei Honor V9 play smart phones with versions earlier than Jimmy-AL00AC00B135 has an authentication bypass vulnerability. Due to improper authentication realization in the 'Find Phone' function. An attacker may exploit the vulnerability to bypass the 'Find Phone' function in order to use the phone normally.
